sentences: Olli Ahvenlahti (born 6 August 1949, in Helsinki) is a Finnish pianist, composer and conductor.
Ahvenlahti succeeded Ossi Runne as the Finnish conductor at the Eurovision Song Contest for the 1990 Contest.
In all, he conducted seven entries until the 1998 Contest (after which the orchestra was abolished) - the exceptions being the 1995 Contest and the 1997 Contest in which Finland did not participate.
